entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:53 a.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 7.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 6:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 7.8°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 15 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 7.1°C
Wind: ENE 28 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:44 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:44 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late in the morning and early afternoon. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:44 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
